channel.title: Duoyi's website about the covid-19 analysis
channel.description: Recent content on Duoyi's website about the covid-19 analysis

item.title: The influencethe of age and gender on the covid-19's ceses
item.description: Abstract: I plot the variables:gender and age groups independently first.Then I try to relate them with the outcome ,and visulizie the relationship between them respectively.Despite the missing data and limitation of resources, I draw a conclusion that there exist a solid connection between age and the recovery rate.But there seem to be no difference beween the gender in front of the covid-19. Motivation: Covid-19 has made the world totally different,it destroys many people’s life,make a lot of people unemployed ，many companies to shut down, even deprive of many people’s life.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
